item.description:
We will meet at the front lobby

Learn about the plants for food and medicine that are in your backyard, your neighborhood, indeed, right under your nose!

Weâ€™ll walk around downtown Beverly and meet the local plants that offer a wealth of food, medicine, and other uses, some free for the picking.

You will also learn about plant identification, safety, and use and preparation. A set of handouts is included as part of the walk.

Fee: $15.00

If you are coming to the walk but your are running late, you can call Iris at 617-773-5809.
For more information, call 617-773-5809 or e-mail info@irisweaver.com.
item.name: Urban Foraging Ramble with Iris Weaver
